definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream

sentences.english: Theoretically, the best sunscreen has the highest SPF number.
sentences.chinese: 理論上來說，最好的防曬霜的防曬係數也就最高。

sentences.english: That the sunscreen is a kind of beauty care products.
sentences.chinese: 認爲防曬霜是一種美容保養品。

sentences.english: Grab your shades and your sunblock.
sentences.chinese: 帶上你的墨鏡和防曬霜。

sentences.english: Stay out of the sun, or use sunscreen and UV-blocking lip balm.
sentences.chinese: 避免接觸陽光或者塗防曬霜，或者防紫外線潤脣膏。

sentences.english: Or wondering whether you should use sunscreen at all?
sentences.chinese: 或者懷疑壓根就不該使用防曬霜？

sentences.english: Consumer Reports does not recommend using products that combine sunscreen with insect repellent.
sentences.chinese: 消費者報告並不推薦人們使用包含了防曬霜的驅蚊劑。

sentences.english: You'd better use sunscreen 15 to 30 min. before going outside.
sentences.chinese: 每次外出前，最好提前15到30分鐘塗好防曬霜。

sentences.english: Slather yourself with sunscreen before you leave home.
sentences.chinese: 在你出家門之前在身上塗一層厚厚的防曬霜。

sentences.english: Before going out, please remember to daub sunscreen cream to protect your skin.
sentences.chinese: 出門前請記得塗抹防曬霜以保護皮膚。

sentences.english: Share your tips or recommendations for good sunscreens in the comments section.
sentences.chinese: 分享你的帖子或在評論部分推薦好的防曬霜。

sentences.english: Do your skin a favour and start the day with alayer of sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 幫幫你的皮膚吧，塗上一層防曬霜再開始一天的生活。

sentences.english: and so, sunscreen happens to apparently be one of these.
sentences.chinese: 所以，顯然防曬霜恰好是其中之一。

sentences.english: Reapply sunscreen every 2 hours and after swimming, exercise and towelling dry.
sentences.chinese: 每2小時後再塗防曬霜，游泳，鍛鍊和毛巾幹。

sentences.english: You'll need sunscreen and insect repellant.
sentences.chinese: 你需要防曬霜和驅蚊劑。

definition: to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
chicken ribs/sth of little value or interest/sth of dubious worth that one is reluctant to give up/to be physically weak
